channel.title: South America on R-Ladies
channel.description: Recent content in South America on R-Ladies

item.title: vacation <- grow(RLadiesNetwork)
item.description: We would like to tell you how one vacation lead to growth of R Ladies community in South America. The story involves multiple countries and crossing paths at the right time in life. Mine Dogucu I am from Turkey but I lived in the United States most of my adulthood. In December 2014, I decided to take a trip to South America - to Chile, Uruguay, and Argentina. Being a graduate student at the time put me in a need to lower my travel costs.
